name: esperancify
description: Esperancify — site institucional e cadastro de voluntários

scripts.build:html: html-minifier-terser --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-css true --minify-js true ./index.html -o dist/index.html && html-minifier-terser --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-css true --minify-js true ./projetos.html -o dist/projetos.html && html-minifier-terser --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-css true --minify-js true ./cadastro.html -o dist/cadastro.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir -p dist/css dist/js dist/imagens && npm run build:html && npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:images
